subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Weight Lifting
lead_paragraph: Kendrick Farris, Chad Vaughn and Casey Burgener have earned a trip to Beijing, claiming spots on the United States weight lifting team in the Olympic trials in Atlanta.
snippet: Kendrick Farris, Chad Vaughn and Casey Burgener have earned a trip to Beijing, claiming spots on the United States weight lifting team in the Olympic trials in Atlanta.
